attributes.action: Make assisted suicide legal to those who want it - I WANT THE RIGHT TO  DIE
attributes.additional_details:
We spend millions on weapon killing thousands of innocent lives, however we are not given the choice to die when we are not well and termanilly ill.
I want to see Assisted suicide made legal in the UK, once we have seen the doctor, been the counselling and consulted the family.
What is the point of keeping someone alive if they dont want to be here.
